attributes.action: To Stop The Facebook Groups Going Around Called "Dead Baby Jokes"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a lot of groups going around facebook called "dead baby jokes" set up by fake, sick people. The groups consist of disgusting jokes, and pictures of dead/abused/murdered babies. Everyone has numerously reported these people/pictures/groups to facebook with no outcome of any ban or admins shutting down the groups. It's very hurtful to any parents who have lost a child or have living children. The pictures and jokes are very disturbing and i don't see how facebook admins can allow such a thing to be published on there website. It's easy for anyone of any age to come across these groups.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Facebook, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
